EmailTemplate.name: 202009_Global_CH_LASEREFIV_Webinar_DR.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date - Honeywell LASEREF IV Upgrade Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LASEREF IV Upgrades! Join Honeywell’s Technical Sales Manager, Ed Borger, for our upcoming webinar – LASEREF IV Upgrade!
Designed specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will provide information on LASEREF IV upgrade options and incentives, plus:
- Affected aircraft with older LASEREF IIs and IIIs - Benefits of the LASEREF IV upgrade - Communication sent to the operators - Dealer sales collateral, trade-in and ordering information
After attending this webinar, you'll be well versed in identifying global opportunities for the upgrade, besides learning how to handle customer objections
DATE September 22nd, 2020
TIME 08:00 a.m. Arizona Time
LOCATION
Online and On-Demand
HOSTED BY Stanton Henderson
PLEASE REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Q4F5YNbVSrOGU36hoW-19Q]]> This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Channel-Partner-Webinars-Opt-In.html]]> to let us know!
